channel.title: Jakub Sygnowski blog
channel.description: Posts on games, programming, and art.

item.title: Importing 3D characters workflow
item.description: In my point-and-click adventure game, I use 3D characters. They are easier to get online than 2D ones, and modifying them or adding animations is also easier. On the other hand, the whole process, from downloading the free assets to getting them into Godot is quite involved, so I decided to document it here.
item.dc:creator: Jakub Sygnowski
